name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】LET THIS RAIN SHAMAN SHINE YOUR DAY!! REAL NO FAKE 100%!! EHEK! #KoboKanaeru3D [8xF1xccpc98]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Kobo Kanaeru performs an acoustic version of 'Uta ni Katachi wa Nai Keredo'.
scenes.song_name: 歌に形はないけれど (Uta ni Katachi wa Nai Keredo)

scenes.description: Post-performance MC section where Kobo talks about her performance and nervousness.

subtitles.original: 歌に形はないけれど
subtitles.english: Though Songs Have No Form

subtitles.original: 砂の白波　波に溶けて
subtitles.english: White crests of sand dissolve into the waves

subtitles.original: きっと夢が終わる
subtitles.english: Surely the dream will end

subtitles.original: 真っ白な世界で　目を覚ませば
subtitles.english: If I wake up in a pure white world

subtitles.original: 伸ばす手は何にも　掴めない
subtitles.english: My reaching hand can't grasp anything

subtitles.original: 見上げた空が　近くなるほどに
subtitles.english: The closer the sky I look up at gets

subtitles.original: 僕は何を失った？
subtitles.english: What did I lose?

subtitles.original: 透き通る波に　映る僕らの影は
subtitles.english: Our shadows reflected in the clear waves

subtitles.original: 青く遠く
subtitles.english: Are blue and distant

subtitles.original: あの日僕は世界を知り
subtitles.english: That day I came to know the world

subtitles.original: それは光となった
subtitles.english: And it became light

subtitles.original: 僕は歌うよ　笑顔をくれた君が
subtitles.english: I'll sing. You who gave me a smile

subtitles.original: 泣いてるとき　ほんの少しだけでもいい
subtitles.english: When you're crying, even if just for a little bit

subtitles.original: 君の支えになりたい
subtitles.english: I want to be your support

subtitles.original: 僕が泣いてしまった日に
subtitles.english: Just as you were for me

subtitles.original: 君がそうだったように
subtitles.english: On the day I cried

subtitles.original: 僕がここに　忘れたものを
subtitles.english: The things I forgot here

subtitles.original: 全て君がくれた宝物
subtitles.english: Are all treasures you gave me

subtitles.original: 形のないものだけが
subtitles.english: Only things without form

subtitles.original: 時の中で色褪せないまま
subtitles.english: Remain unfaded throughout time

subtitles.original: 透き通る波　何度消えてしまっても
subtitles.english: No matter how many times the clear waves disappear

subtitles.original: 砂の白波　僕は君と残すだろう
subtitles.english: I'll surely leave behind white crests of sand with you

subtitles.original: そこに光を集め
subtitles.english: Gathering light there

subtitles.original: 僕は歌うよ　笑顔をくれた君が
subtitles.english: I'll sing. You who gave me a smile

subtitles.original: 泣いてるとき
subtitles.english: When you're crying

subtitles.original: 頼りのない僕だけれど
subtitles.english: Even though I'm unreliable

subtitles.original: 君のこと守りたい
subtitles.english: I want to protect you

subtitles.original: 遠く離れた君のもとへ
subtitles.english: To you who are far away

subtitles.original: この光が　空を越えて羽ばたいていく
subtitles.english: This light will fly across the sky

subtitles.original: そんな歌を届けたい
subtitles.english: I want to deliver such a song

subtitles.original: 僕が贈るものは全て
subtitles.english: Everything I give you

subtitles.original: 形のないものだけど
subtitles.english: Are things without form, but

subtitles.original: 君の心の片隅で
subtitles.english: In a corner of your heart

subtitles.original: 輝く星になりたい
subtitles.english: I want to be a shining star

subtitles.original: Ah, sedikit nggak apa-apa lah ya.
subtitles.english: Ah, it's okay if it was a little off, right?

subtitles.original: Hahaha! Sedikit salah, sorry, sorry!
subtitles.english: Hahaha! A little mistake, sorry, sorry!

subtitles.original: I made some mistakes...
subtitles.english: I made some mistakes...

subtitles.original: ...because I'm so nervous.
subtitles.english: ...because I'm so nervous.

subtitles.original: This is my first time in 3D live singing with acoustic guitar.
subtitles.english: This is my first time in 3D live singing with acoustic guitar.

subtitles.original: The pressure is different from the usual karaoke.
subtitles.english: The pressure is different from the usual karaoke.

subtitles.original: You know, you know?
subtitles.english: You know, you know?

subtitles.original: Sorry, sorry. Grogi!
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry. I'm nervous!

subtitles.original: Ya gitu lah.
subtitles.english: Well, that's how it is.

subtitles.original: Ya udah lah, nggak usah galau-galau lagi lah. Yuk.
subtitles.english: Alright, no need to be gloomy anymore. Let's go.

subtitles.original: Entar ya, aku taruh ini dulu.
subtitles.english: Wait a sec, I'll put this away first.

subtitles.original: Entar ya, aku taruh kursi dulu bentar.
subtitles.english: Wait a sec, I'll put the chair away first.

subtitles.original: Entar, sambil pakai jaket dulu, ちょっと待ってね。
subtitles.english: Wait, putting on my jacket too, wait a moment.
